class.name: LuaError
class.brief_description: Represents an error that occurred during Lua execution.
class.description: The LuaError class encapsulates information about errors that occur during Lua script execution. It provides details about the error type and a descriptive message.

members.member: The error message describing what went wrong.
The error status code indicating the type of error.

constants.constant: The operation yielded (normal state for coroutines).
An error occurred while running the error handler.
An error occurred during garbage collection.
A syntax error occurred during compilation.
An error occurred while handling a file operation.
